alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:52PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/... At 151 PM EDT/1251 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Mexico Beach, or 10 miles north of Port St. Joe, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Tyndall Air Force Base, Honeyville, Allanton, Highland View, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, Overstreet, Milltown, Davis Beach, Willis Landing, Wetappo, Simmons Bayou, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
